snippet.title: SHEP HARD (Indie Speed Run 2013)
snippet.description:
Go play it on your pc at http://www.escapistmagazine.com/content/indie-speed-run/?game=669 and give us a rating!

Take care of your flock! Shear 10 platinum sheep before wolves overcome your tiny island plot and eat all of your hard work. Use your beasty cane, smash attacks, whirlwinds, and maybe some LAND MINES AND MORTARMEN to overcome your enemies.

Made in 48 hours with the theme BALDNESS and the element SHEPHERD by the two Butterscotch brothers, Seth and Sam Coster, for the INDIE SPEED RUN. (indiespeedrun.com)

AND, here's the musicians who made amazing music, which we got from the freemusicarchive.

IAYD - When I Sleep, My Heart Speaks (EC Insomniac Remix) - electric children
Crush at Maracas Bar - Role Music
Awaken, Child - Sycamore Drive
Mortimer's Melody - Sycamore Drive
